reviews.text:
Counter no.8 shirt hair with spectacles, Ms. Huang 黃小姐
Great service and very friendly
Enquiry counter young lady also very nice with patient explanation
Any type of from can just ask from service counter, they will provide
Printer printing or using their computer, photo copy no additional charges (black and white only)

Nearest Photo booth/ gallery at tanglin mall basement 2 (walk distance 5-10min)

Operation hours 9-12pm
Waiting period 10-30min

Why is it  so extrememly difficult  to speak to a customer service  staff at the embassy.
I  need to  quickly get some important  information  before 12pm when the embassy  closes.  It only opens a few short hours everyday, and yet it  is  just impossible to get through to a staff on duty !
Where  is  everybody ??

Super bad experience. They never told me to prepare this document, but on the spot need to submit. To print out this thing you need to have a China phone number, which is impossible to me to have. So I stuck there for a few hours and all staff say nothing they can help cuz it’s the system setting.
bro i called them 10 times since their opening hour and they didnt pick up a single one do you mean you only have 1 line or what this is absurd as an embassy bro

Sad to see so many one star reviews. Genuinely, there are things to be improved to make it a service-oriented place BUT I met this lady at Window 9 who was really helpful and patient. The security uncle downstairs, although very determined about shutting the door on dot at 12pm, is actually approachable.
